titleInfo.title: Coll 29/45(3C) 'Conditions of service of personnel serving in the Persian Gulf: C J Pelly'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with a 31; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the recruitment of Cornelius James Pelly as Political Agent in Bahrain, in 1947.The file is composed of correspondence between Cornelius James Pelly and the Foreign Office.
